channel.title: Need help please im making my first mini game!
channel.description:
Ok i know how to add cases...This is hard to explain.
I need to know how to check if you have the item it would let you pass if that makes any sense?

item.title: Need help please im making my first mini game!
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

Ok heres what im doing.

I have a bunch of firewalls one of them will give you a key.
After you get the key you need to use it on the bookcase.
How can i make it check if you have the key in your invy?
And if you dont have it, i want it to say search firewalls till you get the key.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 12, 2007, 12:11:39 AM[/size][hr]somone? please? soz for double post also

Read full topic
item.source: Need help please im making my first mini game!

item.title: Need help please im making my first mini game!
item.dc:creator: @Got_Java Got Java?
item.description:
@Got_Java wrote:

X-Zile-Pred:

That dose NOT make any sence, Please make sence of your words… and re-post it.

Yes it does…Noob.
montalvom, you add a case…You need to make the case number the Object ID i believe then add ints and so forth i don’t feel like explaining. I feel its good for new users to try once in a while.
